projectList.title: Company Portal Website
details: Migrated a legacy PHP 5.6 portal to PHP 8.2 and refactored it with RESTful APIs, proper routing, and a structured project layout
Improved performance and reliability using Redis caching, Monolog logging, Composer, Git, and SQL Server native drivers
Upgraded the UI to Bootstrap 5 and strengthened form handling with modern JavaScript and server-side validation

projectList.title: SSO Authentication System
details: Built a centralized SSO system using JWT (RS256) for multiple internal applications
Implemented secure access and refresh token handling with cookies and session validation
Eliminated duplicated authentication logic and improved security consistency across systems

projectList.title: Internal E-Invoicing Middleware
details: Designed and developed an e-Invoicing middleware to aggregate and normalize data from multiple systems
Validated invoice totals against the General Ledger to ensure financial accuracy
Securely transmitted verified invoices to external middleware platforms
